works.description:
Article in relation to Facebook's banning of FGS. Authored by me under the pen name diondeville. The content is Digiproved.

I don't mind that the content has been reused but I've asked the scraper to provide clear attribution at both top and bottom of the article that his site's visitors can clearly view and understand so that they're under no illusion as to who wrote the content. The scraper hasn't done that. Looking at his site, I think most of his content is in some way scraped. He's also ranking higher than me in your search results for my own content. Don't you consider content publication times?

All work on my site is original, just so you know.
